title: Rahu Transit in the 11th House for Leo Ascendant
summary: Rahu transiting the eleventh house supercharges ambitions, gains, and social reach for Leo ascendants. Desires expand rapidly, pushing you toward influential networks, large audiences, and unconventional income sources. Sudden gains are possible, but expectations can overshoot reality. Friendships and groups become strategic. When goals are grounded with ethics and planning, Rahu converts big aspirations into scalable, sustainable success.

sections.heading: Core Personality
points: Heightened ambition and desire for growth

sections.heading: Finance
points: Income from large platforms or communities

closing: This transit magnifies gains through networks. With clarity and ethics, Rahu turns big dreams into repeatable success.
